batch: Farm Infrastructure & On-Farm Post-Harvest Support Schemes

schemes.name: On-Farm Drying Yard & Threshing Platform Assistance
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.benefit_summary: Provides subsidy support for construction of on-farm drying yards and threshing platforms to prevent grain damage and moisture losses after harvest.
schemes.eligibility_summary: Small and marginal farmers; priority to rainfed and dryland regions.
schemes.apply_mode: Raitha Samparka Kendra / Taluk Agriculture Office

schemes.name: Assistance for Construction of Farm Storage Sheds
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.benefit_summary: Financial assistance for construction of temporary and semi-permanent storage sheds for safe storage of harvested produce and equipment.
schemes.eligibility_summary: Individual farmers and farmer groups owning farmland.

schemes.name: Rural Farm Road & Field Access Path Development
schemes.department: Department of Rural Development & Panchayat Raj
schemes.benefit_summary: Support for creation and improvement of farm approach roads and field access tracks to enable easier movement of produce and machinery.
schemes.eligibility_summary: Farmers through Gram Panchayat & Village Development Committees.

schemes.name: Farm Boundary Fencing & Crop Protection Assistance
schemes.department: Department of Agriculture, Government of Karnataka
schemes.benefit_summary: Provides partial financial assistance for installation of farm fencing to prevent crop damage from stray animals and wildlife.
schemes.eligibility_summary: Priority to small & marginal farmers near wildlife-conflict regions.
schemes.apply_mode: Taluk Agriculture Office / Forest & Agriculture Joint Scheme Cells

schemes.name: Construction of On-Farm Produce Collection & Shade Platforms
schemes.benefit_summary: Support for construction of shade and raised platforms for temporary storage, grading and loading of harvested produce at farm level.
schemes.eligibility_summary: Individual horticulture farmers, SHGs and farmer groups.
